source.name: LIS (2017)
source.dataPublishedBy: Leiden LIS Budget Incidence Fiscal Redistribution Dataset on Income Inequality (2017), assembled by Jinxian Wang and Koen Caminada (Version 1, November 2017)
source.additionalInfo: Ginis are averaged over the time period available. Time periods are 2006-2013 for Brazil, 2004-2013 for Colombia, 2006-2014 for Guatemala, 2006-2012 for Korea, 1984-2012 for Mexico, 2004-2013 for Peru, 1981-2013 for Taiwan and 22004-2013 for Uruguay.

143072.name: Annual average GDP per capita growth, 1980-2016

source.name: Maddison Project Database (2018)
source.dataPublishedBy: Maddison Project Database, version 2018. Bolt, Jutta, Robert Inklaar, Herman de Jong and Jan Luiten van Zanden (2018), “Rebasing ‘Maddison’: new income comparisons and the shape of long-run economic development”, Maddison Project Working paper 10
source.dataPublisherSource: Historical data and reconstructions from a large number of different sources. See the accompanying paper for details.
source.additionalInfo: The underlying real GDP per capita is in 2011US$ with multiple benchmarks.
